articles.title: Indonesia bans sex outside marriage as parliament passes sweeping new criminal code - CNN
articles.description: Indonesian lawmakers unanimously passed a sweeping new criminal code on Tuesday that criminalizes sex outside marriage, as part of a tranche of changes that critics say threaten human rights and freedoms in the Southeast Asian country.

articles.title: 'Change The Name, End The Stigma' - Campaign Calls for the Renaming of HIV - Branding in Asia Magazine
articles.description: "Change the name, end the stigma" is the core message of the global campaign of the Initiative Youth Against AIDS in partnership with Serviceplan Switzerland. On the occasion of the recent World AIDS Day, an open letter to the Director-General of the World He…

articles.title: World Cup fever boosts business for sports stores, some restaurants in Singapore - CNA
articles.description: Merchandise of the Japanese and South Korean teams is high in demand after both Asian nations advanced to the World Cup knockout stage.
articles.content: Sports stores selling jerseys and shoes said they are seeing businesses increase by more than half, especially merchandise of the Japan and South Korea teams, as well as others that have made it to t… [+1653 chars]

articles.title: Singaporean hits Batam beach on birthday getaway, gets a swole 'present' from sandflies - AsiaOne
